column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: member. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .:Member rdf:type rdfs:Class ;        rdfs:label "Member" ;        rdfs:comment "Represents a member of an organization or a group" .:Membership rdf:type rdfs:Class ;            rdfs:label "Membership" ;            rdfs:comment "Representing the relationship of an entity (the member) being part of a group or organization" .:belongsTo rdf:type rdf:Property ;           rdfs:domain :Member ;           rdfs:range :Group ;           rdfs:label "belongs to" ;           rdfs:comment "Represents the relation of a member belonging to a certain group or organization" .:startMembershipDate rdf:type rdf:Property ;                     rdfs:domain :Membership ;                     rdfs:range rdf:datetime ;                     rdfs:label "membership start date" ;                     rdfs:comment "The date when the membership of a member in a group or organization started" .:endMembershipDate rdf:type rdf:Property ;                   rdfs:domain :Membership ;                   rdfs:range rdf:datetime ;                   rdfs:label "membership end date" ;                   rdfs:comment "The date when the membership of a member in a group or organization ended" .:Group rdf:type rdfs:Class ;       rdfs:label "Group" ;       rdfs:comment "Represents a group or organization that a member can belong to" .```
